exceptions.exn: The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
In environment u : nat -> R H : ex_lim_seq u H0 : Lim_seq u <> 0 l : Type Hu : AbsRing.class_of l T : Type The term "l" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "Rbar".

original: intros u H1 H2. destruct H1 as [l Hu]. exists (Rbar_inv l). apply is_lim_seq_inv in Hu; auto.
